ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '12'
cdt_name:
- cos6
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '12'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-cos7-x86_64
libjpeg_turbo:
- '3'
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version

about.description:
This is the first Open Source distribution of the XForms Library, a
graphical user interface toolkit for X Window Systems.  It should be
considered "provisional".  Hence the Version 0.9999.  There should be
several more 9's following the decimal point.
about.summary: XForms is a graphical user interface toolkit for X based on the X11 Xlib library

about.description:
This is the first Open Source distribution of the XForms Library, a
graphical user interface toolkit for X Window Systems.  It should be
considered "provisional".  Hence the Version 0.9999.  There should be
several more 9's following the decimal point.
about.summary: XForms is a graphical user interface toolkit for X based on the X11 Xlib library

name: xforms
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "xforms" %}
{% set version = "0.9999.5" %}

package:
   name: "{{ name }}"
   version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: http://software.igwn.org/sources/source/xform-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 8d2c39e72c2569c58ae3aef741f8bab49356cbc4804dab1d8252a93ad6dcb92b

build:
  run_exports:
    - {{ pin_subpackage("xforms", max_pin="x") }}
  number: 2
  skip: True  # [not linux]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - {{ cdt('mesa-libgl-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('mesa-dri-drivers') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libselinux') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxdamage') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxxf86vm') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxext') }}     # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('expat') }}     # [linux]
    - meson >=0.50
    - ninja
    - pkg-config
    - libjpeg-turbo
    - xorg-libx11
  host:
    - libjpeg-turbo
    - xorg-libx11
    - xorg-libxfixes  # [linux]
  run:
    - libjpeg-turbo
    - xorg-libx11
    - xorg-libxfixes  # [linux]

test:
  requires:
    - pkg-config
  commands:
    - test -x ${PREFIX}/bin/fdesign  # [unix]
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libforms.so  # [unix]
    - pkg-config --print-errors --modversion xforms
     

about:
  home: https://git.ligo.org/virgo/virgoapp/Xform/
  dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/virgo/virgoApp/Xform/
  license: "LGPL-2.0-only"
  license_family: "GPL"
  license_file: "COPYING"
  summary: XForms is a graphical user interface toolkit for X based on the X11 Xlib library
  description: |
           This is the first Open Source distribution of the XForms Library, a
           graphical user interface toolkit for X Window Systems.  It should be
           considered "provisional".  Hence the Version 0.9999.  There should be
           several more 9's following the decimal point.


extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - duncanmmacleod
    - erinelizabethseder-virgo
    - fcarbogn
